name: High Performance Hand Garden Pruners
description: The premium pruning clippers are constructed of forged aluminum handles and hardened steel blades.This bypass pruner offers a large cutting capacity and well-balanced weight for optimal gardening.

name: Branch Cutter
description: 33-inch Branch Cutter. Compound cutting magnifies input force to do 35% more work with less effort.Compacts steel molecules into our strongest, most durable tools that stay sharper longer.

name: Hedge Shears with Smooth Plastic Grips
description: Partly serrated edge for cutting up to .6-inch thick branches. Sturdy rubber bumpers reduce fatigue through superior cutting performance and very comfortable handling

name: Gardening Fork
description: The premium pruning clippers are constructed of forged aluminum handles and hardened steel blades.This bypass pruner offers a large cutting capacity and well-balanced weight for optimal gardening.

name: Premium Stainless Steel Garden Trowel
description: The premium pruning clippers are constructed of forged aluminum handles and hardened steel blades.This bypass pruner offers a large cutting capacity and well-balanced weight for optimal gardening.

name: Chopping Axe
description: Chops deeper with each swing to get more done faster. Perfected balance and power-to-weight ratio increases swing speed to multiply power, much like an aluminum baseball bat.
